articles.title: Kolbe scores consolation try as Lyon dominate Toulon to claim maiden European Challenge Cup title - News24
articles.description: New Zealanders Jordan Taufua and Charles Ngatai were at the heart of a tough-as-teak Lyon defence that helped the Top 14 team to its first European title with a comprehensive 30-12 victory over Toulon in the Challenge Cup final on Friday.

articles.title: Barassi and Couilloud lead Lyon to Challenge Cup final win over Toulon - The Guardian
articles.description: Toulon had been hoping to replicate the old glory days of Jonny Wilkinson and co but it was Lyon who emerged with the Challenge Cup spoils after a 30-12 victory clinched their first European trophy
